attributes.action: remove the gastly televised advertisment that campaigns against online perscription tablets, in which a man is removing a dead rat from his mouth. This commercial advertisement is disturbing, to say the least, and should be removed immediately. i am surprised that the governing body for terrestrial advertisements would allow for such a sickening sight to be aired. please take action.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

rejection.details: This is a matter for the Advertising Standards Authority. Please go to www.asa.org.uk for further information.
reasons: Material which is potentially confidential, commercially sensitive, or which may cause personal distress or loss
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
